-e ---

# 𒇒 ⋍ 𒌆 TÚG ≈ trough

esir 𒀀𒇒 ≈ estrich "bitumen" esir2 𒇒 esir₂ 𒇉 a'teàrr Teer esirhia 𒇓 •asfirat ἄσφαλτος > asfalt "bitumen, pitch" esir3 𒆓𒆓

𒇒 kunin ≈ 𒆹 bunin peculiar 𒇅 𒇉 buniĝ "trough"

𓂧 𓉔 𓈖 𓏏 𓁶 | forehead | ⲧⲉϩⲛⲓ 𒌆𒊏 TUG2-ra (𒆠𒉆𒌆𒊏 ki-nam-TUG2-ra)
𓂧 𓉔 𓈖 𓏏 𓁶 | forehead | Dach-Kante ⇔ 𒆠𒉆𒀀𒇒𒊏 KI-NAM-ESIR-RA (sic)
𓂧 𓉔 𓈖 𓏏 𓁶 | forehead | chmn™ ⇔ ግምባር gəmbar <?> 𒆠𒉆𒀀𒇒𒊏 ⇔ chin / Kinn / Kante?
